message: I think this is a fair starting point, let's see if you agree.
You were too generous, I'll take a bigger share this time!
Let's meet in the middle this time. I'm willing to give you a bigger share, but I need to get a reasonable amount as well.
I'll take a smaller share, but I'm not going to give you all the power in this negotiation!
I'm still willing to negotiate, but I need a larger share to make this worth my while. Let's try to reach a compromise.
I'm not budging, but I'm willing to meet you halfway... eventually
I'm willing to give you a little more, but I need a larger share to make this worthwhile.  Let's try to come to an agreement before we both lose everything!
I'm not going to give you the whole pie, but I'm willing to compromise
Time is running out. Let's make a deal before we both get nothing.  I'm willing to give you a small share, but I need a significant amount to make it worthwhile.
It's now or never, let's split it 50/50
